akas: First Class: Back for Seconds Singapore (English title) (second season title)
akas from release info: First Class: Back for Seconds Singapore (English title) (second season title)

1.title: Rebels Without a Cause
1.plot: 3 months after Michael's dismissal, Achiever faces its worst problem students, the Party of Five. Can Mr. Chow and the teachers convince Michael to return and stop the Party of Five from terrorising students, relief teachers, and cars?

2.title: Much Ado About Erica
2.plot: Lynda Harapan, Ms. Mardy's sister, joins Achiever as their Music teacher. But this former singer-cum-diva finds it hard to adjust to the life of a teacher. Who (or what) is Erica, and why can't Helmi live without her?

3.title: The Blind Baba
3.plot: Achiever is gripped by The Blind Baba fever - CY's favorite TV show. But when the school's obsession reaches psychotic heights, it's up to Li Li to bring everybody back to their senses. Meanwhile, Michael's dark secret comes to light.

4.title: Enter the Dragon
4.plot: An over-worked Ashley attends a counseling course under the persuasion of Sia Chung An, Achiever's new principal - who's also Nic's crush. Will there be explosions? Will there be a mental breakdown? Will the school ever be the same again?

5.title: Fighting Club
5.plot: Mr. Chow's demoted to teaching P.E., while Noel takes over as Home Economics teacher , and Yvonne, his first love, joins Achiever as vice-principal. Meanwhile, Daniel confronts Achiever's most notorious bully, Tyler.

6.title: The Credit Crunch
6.plot: Mr. Raju's daughter, Divya, joins Achiever as a relief teacher. It's a dream come true - but for Divya or Mr. Raju? Meanwhile, the Party of Five discover the joys of Cathy's credit card, until Tyler woos Cathy and turns her against them.

7.title: Injustice for All
7.plot: The Party of Five meet Shanti, a psychoanalyzing exchange student, but Achiever's most nefarious students want her to join their Injustice Gang. Meanwhile, Chow discovers Sia's treachery during a paintball session, but no one believes him.

8.title: Beauty and the Beast
8.plot: Li Li finally has her chance at love when Sia sets her up on a blind date that is too good to be true. CY falls for Shanti, but peer pressure forces him to choose between her or the Party of Five. Will Li Li and CY find true love?

9.title: Exit the Dragon
9.plot: Sia finally executes his plan to take over Achiever, and not even the combined might of the teachers can stop him. A lonely Helmi forms a bond with Mr. Chow - but will this connection be strong enough to overcome Sia's dastardly ambitions?

10.title: Sleeping with the Enemy
10.plot: Michael moves in with Noel - who might not be the perfect room mate he thinks he is. Something's "bugging" Nic, but her mother is too busy with Crimewatch auditions to take care of her. Then Nic loses a fight to Tyler - and DIES.

11.title: The Numbers Game
11.plot: Mr. Gay's position is jeopardized when Mrs. Poon returns to Achiever after 12 long years of maternity leave, and Daniel's shameful addiction is in danger of being discovered when he falls asleep everywhere.

12.title: Rocking the Vote
12.plot: The Prefectorial Elections are here - with Nic and Tyler running neck-to-neck. Meanwhile, Mr. Raju must win back his wife when she kicks him out for being unromantic. Can Michael and Li Li help Mr. Raju find his inner Casanova?

13.title: I Not Stupid
13.plot: Mr. Gay has been lying to his son Brighton that he's Principal of Achiever. Can he keep up the charade when the young man visits? Meanwhile, Chow enrolls Daniel in a competition, but the overwork causes the boy's mental state to crumble.

14.title: Candid Camera
14.plot: As Achiever faces the threat of being absorbed by arch-rivals Pan Island, Cathy transfers to a new school - for geniuses. Can Michael and the Party of Five keep Achiever unscathed? Will Cathy return? And what's Mr Chow doing in the Bahamas?

1.title: Party of Five
1.plot: Mr. Michael Wong, Achiever Secondary School's newest teacher, helps five Secondary One students who have been left out of their orientation games. Will their first day of secondary school end with a bang or a whimper?

2.title: If the Glove Fits...
2.plot: It's the annual CCA fair, and all of them are fighting for new secondary one members. But the Party of Five just want to join CCAs for the CCA points. Will they succumb to the tempting materialism of CCA points? Or will they join Michael's two-member Drama Club?

3.title: Noel Lee: A Tragedy in 5 Parts
3.plot: Noel and the Track & Field team are forced to work with their rival team from Pan Island Secondary School, who reveal his surprising past. Meanwhile, will Cathy choose to be with the Party of Five or her new friends, the No-Belles?

4.title: Citizen Gay
4.plot: Michael falls for Lindsey, the new clerk, while volunteering at an old folks' home with Mr. Gay, Li Li and the kids. But can Helmi deal with the consequences when his tricks go overboard, and can Mr. Gay face the rather mundane truth about his past?

5.title: The Immaculate Deception
5.plot: Ashley trains CY to be his cooking protégé, not knowing that CY is actually passing off someone else's cooking as his own. Meanwhile, Michael suspects there's 'something' about Lindsey - but will it jeopardize their budding relationship?

6.title: The Green-Eyed Monster
6.plot: Daniel's family secret distances him from the Party of Five. Meanwhile, Mr. Chow pushes Ms. Mardy's Go Green campaign to unreasonable extremes. Can Michael and the Party of Five (well, four now) help them both before it is too late?

7.title: Who Framed Raju Raja?
7.plot: Raju and the teachers discover YouTube videos depicting them ill-treating students, and Nic must learn to control her temper when Billy, the school bully, provokes her. Will Raju's name be cleared, and will Nic fall for Billy's taunts?

8.title: Creativity Killed the Cat
8.plot: Full-day enrichment lessons replace normal ones when Mr. Chow revamps the school's teaching methods and curriculum. With the kids too tired to do homework or study, can Michael save the students before they all collapse from exhaustion?

9.title: More Equal Than Others
9.plot: Michael meets the new trainee teacher Candy, and Mr. Chow decides to be nice for the first time in his life. When his niceness leads to a crisis, the teachers join forces to return him to his normal evil self - but will it be enough?

10.title: Michael Gets Fired (Really!)
10.plot: Mr. Chow takes over Michael's play, "Animal Barn", while Li Li gets increasingly jealous of Candy's relationship with Michael. Will Candy and Michael be together? Will Li Li finally get her heart's desire? Will Mr. Chow ruin the play?

imdb.plot outline: In Achiever Secondary School, a new teacher fresh from NIE arrives for his first day of school, his mind filled with thoughts of sweet young kids who are willing to learn and altruistic dedicated teachers eager to teach. He later finds that his dream job has some nightmare moments, the kids are not so easy to lovingly nurture and the teachers he loved and respected are somewhat lacking when he has to work alongside them. Also, a group of new Secondary 1 students become friends, learning through school activities and classes about growing up and the meaning of true friendship, and sometimes even learn something academic, if they're lucky.
imdb.title: First Class
plot: In Achiever Secondary School, a new teacher fresh from NIE arrives for his first day of school, his mind filled with thoughts of sweet young kids who are willing to learn and altruistic dedicated teachers eager to teach. He later finds that his dream job has some nightmare moments, the kids are not so easy to lovingly nurture and the teachers he loved and respected are somewhat lacking when he has to work alongside them. Also, a group of new Secondary 1 students become friends, learning through school activities and classes about growing up and the meaning of true friendship, and sometimes even learn something academic, if they're lucky.
